column9: The occasion was a company dinner, and the Stadsparken Restaurang proved to be an excellent choice, with tasteful dishes and impeccable service. To be considered also for further future occasions.

Visited with group of colleagues. The restaurant as such offers great ambience but unfortunately the food and service was not fully on par this time. We did not feel particularly well taken care of and the food was just OK, not more.

We had tortellini with chanterelle plus a burger. Just under 200 sek each. The tortellini obviousely not made in restaurant but semifinished. Our table located in back-end area of restaurant which could certainly benefit from some refurbishment and paint.

Nicely located in the park setting of Stadsparken. This contemporary bar is the place to go if the weather is nice. Not overly pricey for drinks (as Lund goes), a large outdoor area to enjoy the garden sights, and a large indoor area with lots...More

column7: a nice restaurant in the park
column9: The food is good and the surroundings in the park are awesome. This place is perfect for a nice lunch when weather is good.

The location is very nice, it the city park, with possibility to have a meal outside.
The food is of medium quality and compared to the other restaurants in the town is more expensive.(avg 340 sek each person).
Portions are served in small quantities.

column7: Give better value to the money!
column9:
The location is nice, the restaurant itself pretty nice and elegant.

never had dinner here though.

column7: After work in the sun and a fabulous waitress
column9:

Nice atmosphere and location as well

Location is a bit off, but parking house just close by.
Lunch is expensive but if on business lunch is well worth it.
Food quality is excellent.

Been visiting a couple of weekends a month for brunch for almost a year now. It is by far the best place for brunch in Lund. Very nice during summer to sit outside. Be sure to book a table in advance.
Lunch of the day is always good. Excellent place to go in summer for great environment and nice food.
